B.14 Diagnostics
Prev Appendix B. Core tasks Next

B.14 Diagnostics

Runs phing's -diagnostics code inside phing itself. This is good for debugging phing's configuration under an IDE.

B.14.1 Example

<target name="diagnostics" description="diagnostics">
                <diagnostics/>
                </target>
